job_details.degree_required: BS in Computer Science or equivalent

jd: From: Kunal Bhatt, Resource Consultings kunal.bhatt@rconsultinginc.com Reply to: kunal.bhatt@rconsultinginc.com Job Title - Pega/Maven Senior AdvisorLocation – Austin, TX, Memphis TN, Morris Plains, NJ and St. Louis, MO (must be able to go into office weekly 1-2 days)Duration – 3 months contract (possibility of extension)MUST HAVES:10 or more years of hands-on experience with Pega PRPC 8.x or aboveExperience in using Eclipse, Intellij and GIT for Integrated Development Environments (IDE) primarily for Java development, supporting various languages through plugins.Experience or familiarity in using Maven, CI/CD - Jenkins, Newrelic, Splunk, Postman to automate your build, test, and deployment processesSkills:10 or more years of hands-on experience with Pega PRPC 8.x or aboveExperience in using Eclipse, Oracle, Intellij and GITExperience or familiarity in using Maven, CI/CD - Jenkins, Newrelic, Splunk, PostmanExcellent triaging skills, SQL querying expertise to identify issuesAbility to work in large, collaborative teams to achieve team & organizational goals.Should have can-do attitude, strong analytical skills, be a problem solver and a self-starterPrior experience in large scale healthcare initiatives preferred but not mandatory.Education:BS in Computer Science or equivalent
